testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Disable Offline Mode with internet unreachable ?[90m# forced_offline_mode.feature:40?[0m ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32moffline mode is enabled with unreachable internet?[0m ?[90m# initialisation_steps.groovy:72?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32man initialised environment?[0m ?[90m# initialisation_steps.groovy:79?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mthe system is bootstrapped?[0m ?[90m# initialisation_steps.groovy:115?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter "?[0m?[32m?[1msdk offline disable?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:5?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see "?[0m?[32m?[1mOnline mode re-enabled!?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:15?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter "?[0m?[32m?[1msdk install grails 2.1.0?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:5?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see "?[0m?[32m?[1mOFFLINE MODE ENABLED!?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:15?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see "?[0m?[32m?[1mStop! grails 2.1.0 is not available in offline mode.?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:15?[0m
